channel.title: Security on Cache Valley Communities
channel.description: Recent content in Security on Cache Valley Communities

item.title: DIY Mobile Verification Toolkit (MVT) Workshop
item.description: A self-paced, hands-on workshop on using the Mobile Verification Toolkit (MVT) for ethical mobile forensics. Complete it anytime. Occasional in-person sessions may be offered separately.

item.title: DIY Mobile Verification Toolkit (MVT) Workshop
item.description: A self-paced, hands-on workshop on using the Mobile Verification Toolkit (MVT) for ethical mobile forensics. Complete it anytime. Occasional in-person sessions may be offered separately.

item.title: Cache Tech Community Meetup - May 2025
item.description: Join us on May 24th, 2025, at 1:30 PM (MST) at Bridgerland Technical College for a tech meetup focused on DNS. The event features an open discussion on tech careers and a deep dive into DNS security vulnerabilities. Open to all skill levels—bring your laptop and curiosity!
